verses.text: “\w Can|strong="H4758"\w* \w you|strong="H1571"\w* pull \w in|strong="H1571"\w* Leviathan \w with|strong="H1571"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* hook \w or|strong="H1571"\w* tie \w down|strong="H2904"\w* \w his|strong="H1571"\w* tongue \w with|strong="H1571"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* rope?

\w Can|strong="H4310"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* put \w a|strong="H3068"\w* cord \w through|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* nose \w or|strong="H3808"\w* pierce \w his|strong="H6440"\w* jaw \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* hook?
\w Will|strong="H4310"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* beg \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w for|strong="H8478"\w* mercy \w or|strong="H4310"\w* speak \w to|strong="H8064"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* softly?

\w Will|strong="H1697"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H2790"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* covenant \w with|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H1697"\w* take \w him|strong="H1697"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* slave \w for|strong="H3808"\w* life?

\w Can|strong="H4310"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* pet \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w like|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* bird \w or|strong="H4310"\w* put \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w on|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* leash \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* maidens?

\w Will|strong="H4310"\w* traders barter \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w or|strong="H1817"\w* divide \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w among|strong="H4310"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* merchants?
Can you fill \w his|strong="H5462"\w* hide with harpoons \w or|strong="H4043"\w* \w his|strong="H5462"\w* head with fishing spears?

If \w you|strong="H3808"\w* lay \w a|strong="H3068"\w* hand \w on|strong="H3808"\w* him, \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H7307"\w* remember \w the|strong="H5066"\w* battle \w and|strong="H5066"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* repeat \w it|strong="H3808"\w*!

\w Surely|strong="H3808"\w* hope \w of|strong="H3808"\w* overcoming \w him|strong="H1692"\w* \w is|strong="H3808"\w* \w false|strong="H3808"\w*. \w Is|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3920"\w* sight \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w him|strong="H1692"\w* overwhelming?

No one \w is|strong="H5869"\w* so fierce \w as|strong="H5869"\w* \w to|strong="H5869"\w* rouse Leviathan. Then who \w is|strong="H5869"\w* able \w to|strong="H5869"\w* \w stand|strong="H5869"\w* \w against|strong="H5869"\w* \w Me|strong="H5869"\w*?

\w Who|strong="H1980"\w* \w has|strong="H6310"\w* given \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w Me|strong="H1980"\w* \w that|strong="H4422"\w* \w I|strong="H1980"\w* \w should|strong="H1980"\w* repay \w him|strong="H1980"\w*? Everything under heaven \w is|strong="H6310"\w* Mine.
\w I|strong="H3318"\w* cannot keep silent \w about|strong="H3318"\w* \w his|strong="H3318"\w* limbs, \w his|strong="H3318"\w* power \w and|strong="H3318"\w* graceful form.

\w Who|strong="H5315"\w* can strip \w off|strong="H3318"\w* \w his|strong="H3318"\w* outer coat? \w Who|strong="H5315"\w* can approach \w him|strong="H3318"\w* \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* bridle?
Who can \w open|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* jaws, ringed \w by|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* fearsome teeth?
\w His|strong="H5921"\w* rows \w of|strong="H5921"\w* scales \w are|strong="H1077"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* pride, tightly sealed \w together|strong="H1692"\w*.
One scale \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w so|strong="H3644"\w* near \w to|strong="H3820"\w* another \w that|strong="H3820"\w* \w no|strong="H3332"\w* air can pass between them.
\w They|strong="H7667"\w* are joined \w to|strong="H1481"\w* one another; \w they|strong="H7667"\w* clasp \w and|strong="H2398"\w* cannot be separated.

\w His|strong="H6965"\w* snorting flashes \w with|strong="H6965"\w* light, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w his|strong="H6965"\w* eyes \w are|strong="H2719"\w* like \w the|strong="H6965"\w* rays \w of|strong="H2719"\w* dawn.
Firebrands stream \w from|strong="H6086"\w* \w his|strong="H2803"\w* mouth; fiery sparks shoot forth!
Smoke billows \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* nostrils \w as|strong="H1121"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* boiling pot \w over|strong="H2015"\w* burning reeds.
\w His|strong="H2803"\w* breath sets coals ablaze, \w and|strong="H7494"\w* flames pour from \w his|strong="H2803"\w* mouth.
Strength resides \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* neck, \w and|strong="H8478"\w* dismay leaps \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.
\w The|strong="H7760"\w* folds \w of|strong="H3220"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* flesh are tightly joined; \w they|strong="H7760"\w* are firm \w and|strong="H3220"\w* immovable.

\w His|strong="H2803"\w* chest \w is|strong="H8415"\w* \w as|strong="H2803"\w* hard \w as|strong="H2803"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* rock, \w as|strong="H2803"\w* hard \w as|strong="H2803"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lower millstone!

\w When|strong="H6213"\w* Leviathan rises \w up|strong="H5921"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* mighty \w are|strong="H6213"\w* \w terrified|strong="H2844"\w*; \w they|strong="H5921"\w* withdraw \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* thrashing.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* sword \w that|strong="H7200"\w* reaches \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w has|strong="H4428"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* effect, \w nor|strong="H1121"\w* does \w the|strong="H3605"\w* spear \w or|strong="H1121"\w* dart \w or|strong="H1121"\w* \w arrow|strong="H1121"\w*.
He regards iron as straw and bronze as rotten wood.
No arrow can make him flee; slingstones become like chaff to him.
\w A|strong="H3068"\w* club is regarded as straw, and he laughs at the sound of the lance.
His undersides are jagged potsherds, spreading out the mud like \w a|strong="H3068"\w* threshing sledge.
He makes the depths seethe like \w a|strong="H3068"\w* cauldron; he makes the sea like \w a|strong="H3068"\w* jar of ointment.
He leaves \w a|strong="H3068"\w* glistening wake behind him; one would think the deep had white hair!
Nothing on earth is his equal—\w a|strong="H3068"\w* creature devoid of fear!
He looks down on all the haughty; he is king over all the proud.”
